description: This gorgeous pendant has been handcrafted from an upcycled postage stamp from the Republique of Burundi (c.1968). It features a stunning purple and black butterfly (Salamis temora "Blue Mother-of-Pearl") with gold highlights that glitter in natural sunlight. The butterfly is thought to symbolise many different things. In Ancient Greece it represented the soul and mind. In other cultures it can also symbolise love, rebirth and new beginnings. It’s also thought to be good luck if one lands on you. This unique pendant would make a wonderful gift for Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries (1st wedding anniversary ~ paper, 3rd wedding anniversary ~ glass), Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day or simply as a piece of keepsake jewellery. This beautiful stamp features a stunning black and lime green butterfly (Trogonoptera brookiana, "Rajah Brooke's Birdwing"). The butterfly is thought to symbolise many different things. In Ancient Greece it represented the soul and mind. In other cultures it can also symbolise love, rebirth and new beginnings. It’s also thought to be good luck if one lands on you. This unique pendant would make a wonderful gift for Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries (1st wedding anniversary ~ paper, 3rd wedding anniversary ~ glass), Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day or simply as a piece of keepsake jewellery. Your order will be gift wrapped and ready for giving. The colours in the stamp are magnified by the crystal clear, domed glass cabochon, creating a stunning and unique piece of jewellery. This oval pendant measures 22mm x 30mm (not including the bail). It has a silver finish and comes with a complimentary 45cm curb link chain. (Click here to upgrade to a longer chain). All Max & Me postage stamp jewellery is nickel and lead free. Max & Me postage stamp pendants are water resistant but not entirely waterproof so please remove before swimming or bathing. It was part of a double stamp that was issued to commemorate the centennial of the gift of more than 3,000 cherry blossom trees from Tokyo. The postage stamp has a light postmark on it which is a lovely reminder that it has been on a journey somewhere around the world. Every Max & Me pendant is a one of a kind (OOAK) and would make a wonderful gift for Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries (1st wedding anniversary ~ paper, 3rd wedding anniversary ~ glass), Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day or simply as a piece of keepsake jewellery. Your order will be gift wrapped and ready for giving. The colours in the stamp are magnified by the crystal clear, domed glass cabochon, creating a stunning and unique piece of jewellery. The pendant measures 1 inch in diameter and has an antique bronze finish. It comes with a complimentary 45cm curb link chain (click here to upgrade to a longer chain). All Max & Me jewellery is nickel and lead free. Max & Me jewellery is water resistant but not waterproof so please remove before swimming or bathing. Keep up to date with our latest designs and receive exclusive offers and competitions by joining our Mailing List and liking us on Facebook

name: Max & Me Gift Voucher
description:
Looking for something special to give to your friends & loved ones but can't decide what to choose?  A Max & Me gift voucher could be just the thing!

This voucher can be used on any product, including customised artwork orders and is valid for 12 months from date of purchase.

The gift voucher will be sent to you via email, the perfect solution if you need a gift at the last minute!

If you prefer, we can also send the voucher directly to the recipient with a gift card enclosed. Simply send us an email after purchase via our Contact page with the message you would like in the card and the recipient's address.
